Description: Runs a passed in ModuleScript. It has multiple functions called: 'pre_run', 'run' and 'release' each handled by the framework. Using the 'flags' you can define a few rule for the handler to follow.

Returns.directory: Returns the folder that all handler events are stored
Returns.state: Returns the current state that the handler is at. These include: 'PreRan', 'Ran', 'Released' and 'Completed'.

Flags.doPre_Run: Determines if the handler should perform the pre_run function. By defualt this function is set to False!
Flags.scriptTimeOut: Determines when a script times out when there is a conditional loop. Eg if there is no return from the pre_run function within 5 seconds (default) the script will be released.
Flags.data: Used as an argument for the handled script. You can pass any table of data into the flag and it will be passed into the handled script.
